name: Cranium Nano Cloak
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** The Red Cranium Nano Cloak is a Clan & Meta-Physicist only item but you can remove some of these requirements. Doing so however will also remove or lower some of the modifiers: Nano Init. and MaxNanoEnergy. The quality of the Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool and Hacker Tool must be at least 40% of QL of the cloak. *** #L "Red Cranium Nano Cloak" "204996" #L "Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool" "164558" #L "Advanced Hacker Tool" "87814" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Red Cranium Nano Cloak + Field Quantum Physics All-Purpose Tool = #L "Grey Cranium Nano Cloak" "204998" Skills: |FQP tool needs to be at least 40% the ql of Tank Armor. You'll need 5x Field Quantum Physics skill to hack it.| Grey Cranium Nano Cloak + Advanced Hacker Tool = #L "Grey Nano Cloak" "205000" Skills: |Hacker Tool needs to be at least 40% of the ql of the Cloak. Requires 6X of cloaks QL of Breaking & Entering and the QL of the.|
